description: Pull on the Men's Ridgefield Sherpa-Lined Flannel Jacket to shovel out your driveway in the morning or swing an axe on the weekend. This brushed flannel is constructed using recycled polyester and cotton and body-lined with recycled polyester sherpa that is just right for those crisp fall nights.
name: Marmot Ridgefield Heavyweight Sherpa LS Flannel - Mens
